Tomato___Late_blight.organic: Spray neem oil; remove infected parts early.
Tomato___Late_blight.chemical: Use copper fungicide; apply metalaxyl-based fungicides.
Tomato___Late_blight.prevention: Ensure good drainage; avoid wet leaves overnight; crop rotation.

Tomato___healthy.organic: Maintain soil health with compost and neem cake.
Tomato___healthy.prevention: Regular monitoring, proper irrigation, and avoid overcrowding.

Grape___healthy.organic: Mulching and use of organic fertilizers.
Grape___healthy.prevention: Proper pruning, canopy management, and disease-free seedlings.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).organic: Introduce natural predators of psyllid insects; neem sprays.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).prevention: Remove infected trees; use disease-free planting stock.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.organic: Spray milk solution (1:9 ratio with water) or neem oil.
Squash___Powdery_mildew.chemical: Sulfur dusting or fungicides like trifloxystrobin.
Squash___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Plant resistant varieties; ensure good airflow.

Potato___healthy.prevention: Rotate crops; use certified seed potatoes.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.organic: Apply compost tea or neem-based sprays.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids; rotate with non-host crops.

Tomato___Early_blight.organic: Use compost tea or neem oil sprays.
Tomato___Early_blight.prevention: Avoid overhead irrigation; rotate crops regularly.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.organic: Remove affected leaves; apply baking soda spray.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.chemical: Use fungicides like mancozeb or chlorothalonil.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Avoid water splashing; provide staking for airflow.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.organic: Neem oil sprays; intercropping to reduce spread.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.prevention: Rotate crops and use resistant maize varieties.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.organic: Apply compost tea; remove damaged leaves.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.prevention: Ensure good air circulation; avoid overhead watering.

Peach___healthy.prevention: Prune trees regularly; monitor for pests.

Apple___Apple_scab.organic: Apply sulfur sprays and neem oil.
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Prune trees and remove fallen leaves.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.organic: Use neem oil to control whiteflies.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Plant resistant varieties; use row covers.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Avoid working with wet plants; use certified seeds.

Apple___Black_rot.organic: Prune infected twigs; apply compost tea.
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Remove mummified fruits; maintain orchard hygiene.

Blueberry___healthy.organic: Use pine mulch and organic fertilizers.
Blueberry___healthy.prevention: Monitor for fungal infections and prune regularly.

Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Prune for airflow; avoid excess nitrogen fertilizer.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.organic: Apply compost tea; prune infected branches.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.organic: Remove nearby juniper hosts; neem sprays.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.prevention: Plant resistant apple varieties; remove galls early.

Tomato___Target_Spot.organic: Neem oil sprays; remove lower leaves.
Tomato___Target_Spot.prevention: Improve air circulation and avoid overhead watering.

Potato___Late_blight.organic: Neem oil sprays; remove infected leaves.
Potato___Late_blight.prevention: Use certified seeds; ensure good drainage.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.prevention: Avoid handling plants after smoking; use clean seeds.

Strawberry___healthy.prevention: Keep soil well-drained and avoid overcrowding.

Apple___healthy.prevention: Prune regularly and monitor for pests.

Grape___Black_rot.organic: Neem sprays and removal of infected fruit.
Grape___Black_rot.prevention: Remove mummified grapes; prune for airflow.

Potato___Early_blight.prevention: Crop rotation and proper irrigation management.

Cherry_(including_sour)___healthy.prevention: Prune trees for airflow and monitor pests.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids; avoid dense planting.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).organic: Remove infected wood and apply bio-control agents.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).chemical: No effective chemical cure; fungicides only preventive.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).prevention: Maintain vineyard hygiene; avoid trunk injuries.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.organic: Neem sprays and baking soda solution.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.prevention: Plant resistant varieties and reduce humidity.

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.organic: Spray with insecticidal soap or neem oil.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.prevention: Keep plants hydrated; encourage natural predators.

Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Avoid wet foliage and use disease-free seeds.

Corn_(maize)___healthy.organic: Apply compost and balanced organic fertilizers.
Corn_(maize)___healthy.prevention: Use crop rotation and proper irrigation.
